posts.post_content:
For sale is my 1912 Chief Bender S81 silk #94. There's the obvious staining and wrinkles, but it has a good image, color, and is obviously rare. Back of silk has the same staining as on front. Measures roughly 6 7/8" wide by 8.5" tall.

$SOLD

Price includes shipping. Payment via Paypal 'Gift/FF' ONLY. Please PM me to buy or with questions. Thanks.........Matt
